64783.ko: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨! 와 주었구나.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64783.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>！你来了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64784.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>We found an effective way of confronting Gorius'
vengeful spirit!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64784.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私たち　ゴリウスさんの怨霊を
　迎え撃つ　効果的な方法を見つけたの！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64784.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 우리가 고리우스 씨의 원령과
　맞서 싸울 효과적인 방법을 알아냈어!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64784.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我们找到能有效
对抗格利乌斯怨灵的方法了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64784.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我們找到有效的方法
可以對付格利烏斯先生的怨靈了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64785.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>That is, y'know, materializing Gorius with the special
magic sigil, so that we can fight him with swords and
spells.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64785.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「それはね　ゴリウスさんを　特別な魔法陣で
　実体化させて　剣や　呪文が効くようにしてから
　戦うって方法なんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64785.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 고리우스 씨를 특별한 마법진으로
　실체화해서 검이나 주문이 통하도록 만든 후에
　싸우는 방법이야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64785.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>方法就是通过一种特殊的魔法阵
让格利乌斯变成实体，
这样就能够用剑和魔法攻击到它了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64785.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>方法就是用一種特殊的魔法陣，
讓格利烏斯先生化為實體，
這樣就能用武器和咒文對付他了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64786.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>But, we don't have any of the ingredients at all to
draw the magic sigil at present. If only we could
gather the ingredients, to draw that magic sigil...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64786.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「でも　その魔法陣を描く材料が　全然
　足りてないの。材料さえ集められれば
　魔法陣を描くことが　できるのに……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64786.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 마법진을 그릴 재료가
　아직 많이 부족해. 재료만 모으면
　마법진을 그릴 수 있을 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64786.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>但是画魔法阵要用的材料完全不够，
只要材料集齐了，
就能画魔法阵了……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64786.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>不過，畫魔法陣需要的材料
完全不夠。要是能找齊材料的話，
就能畫出魔法陣了……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64787.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>So, sorry, but I want to ask you, <pc>, to
help me gather those materials. How about it? Will
you do that for me?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64787.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「それで　悪いんだけど　その材料を集めるのを
　<pc>さんにも　手伝ってもらいたいの。
　どうかな？　お願いできる？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64787.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그래서 미안하지만 그 재료를 모을 수 있도록
　<pc> 씨도 도와줬으면 해.
　어때? 부탁해도 될까?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64787.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>所以很抱歉，希望<pc>也能帮
我们一起收集材料。
怎么样？可以拜托你吗？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64787.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>所以我想麻煩<pc>
幫忙蒐集材料。
怎麼樣？可以拜託你嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64788.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>To draw the magic sigil, <pc>, I want you to
gather 5 piles of Apparition Ash.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「魔法陣を　描くための材料で
　<pc>さんに　集めてきてもらいたいのは
　具象の霊灰を　５個だよ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64788.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 마법진을 그리기 위한 재료 중에
　<pc> 씨가 모아 주었으면 하는 건
　구상의 영험한 재 5개야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64788.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>画魔法阵所需的材料叫具象灵灰。
我想请<pc>
帮我收集５个。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64788.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>畫出魔法陣需要的材料裡面，
我需要<pc>幫忙蒐集
５個具象靈灰。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64789.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It seems you can obtain it by defeating <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s
in this world's Arahaghiro Region.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「こっちの世界の　アラハギーロ地方にいる

64789.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이쪽 세계의 아라하길로 지방에 있는
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(을,를) 쓰러뜨리면
　구상의 영험한 재를 얻을 수 있대.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64789.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>据说只要打倒这个世界的
艾拉哈奇罗地区的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
就能得到具象灵灰。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64789.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>打倒這個世界的
艾拉哈奇羅地方的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>，
應該就能拿到。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64790.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>If only we could gather the ingredients, we could draw
that magic sigil, materialize Gorius' vengeful spirit, and
fight it...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64790.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「材料が集まれば　魔法陣で
　ゴリウスさんの怨霊を　実体化させて

64790.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 재료를 다 모으면 마법진으로

64790.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>只要集齐材料，我们就能用魔法阵

64791.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>We'll wait here while making preparations, so when

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私たちは　ここで準備してるから

64791.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 우린 여기서 준비하고 있을 테니까

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我们会在这里做准备，

64792.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc> 씨! 어서 와.

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「他の材料は　全部　集まったの！

64793.zh-Hant:

<pc>は　セラフィに

64795.zh-Hant:
<pc>將具象靈灰

<start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>Seraphy! As planned, I've arranged for the Monster

64798.en: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Shimere, thank you!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64798.ja: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「シメールさん　ありがとう！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64798.ko: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 시멜 씨, 고마워!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64799.en: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Then, I'll explain the plan, okay.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64799.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那我要說明計畫囉。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>No way! Without that, I can't draw the magic sigil.

64801.en:
<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>So, if we got you to come to the Monster Arena's

<start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>On the battleground, we'll draw the magic sigil, and
